name: deng-toolkit
description: Data engineering toolkit for database metadata management, ontology building, and SQL pattern analysis
author: Jensen Carlsen

commands.name: deng-catalog-refresh
commands.description: Rebuild database metadata catalog from SQL Server

commands.name: deng-find-data
commands.description: Fast keyword search for tables/columns in the catalog

commands.name: deng-build-ontology
commands.description: Build JSON-LD knowledge graph from metadata

commands.name: deng-analyze-procedures
commands.description: Extract SQL patterns from stored procedures

commands.name: deng-catalog-status
commands.description: Show catalog age, statistics, and health

commands.name: deng-catalog-sync
commands.description: Sync catalog changes with team via git
